metadata.name: Suspicious Msiexec Execute Arbitrary DLL
metadata.comment: Adversaries may abuse msiexec.exe to proxy execution of malicious payloads. Msiexec.exe is the command-line utility for the Windows Installer and is thus commonly associated with executing installation packages (.msi)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -y')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /y')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –y')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —y')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―y'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" /y "c:\\\\program files\\\\bonjour\\\\mdnsnsp.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" /y "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\bonjour\\\\mdnsnsp.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" /y "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\apple software update\\\\scriptingobjectmodel.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" /y "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\apple software update\\\\softwareupdateadmin.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" /y "c:\\\\windows\\\\ccm\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" /y c:\\\\windows\\\\ccm\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" -y "c:\\\\program files\\\\bonjour\\\\mdnsnsp.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" -y "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\bonjour\\\\mdnsnsp.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" -y "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\apple software update\\\\scriptingobjectmodel.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" -y "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\apple software update\\\\softwareupdateadmin.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" -y "c:\\\\windows\\\\ccm\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe" -y c:\\\\windows\\\\ccm\\\\'))))

output.summary: Adversaries may abuse msiexec.exe to proxy execution of malicious payloads. Msiexec.exe is the command-line utility for the Windows Installer and is thus commonly associated with executing installation packages (.msi)
